project_abstract.cdata: The Elbistan Power Project will help finance the development of an open-cast lignite mine in East-Central Turkey by TKI with an annual output of about 17-20 million tons and construction by TEK of a mine-based thermal power station with a capacity of 1,200 MW and associated transmission lines.
